sentence: During today's meeting, we discussed two upcoming projects for our development team.
We aim to deploy an MVP version of that chat what within four weeks.
The second project focuses on developing a cloud-based inventory management system for warehouse operation.
Mathform must support automated restocking alerts, barcode scanning, integration, and detailed analytics dashboards.
We are targeting compilation in about six weeks.
From end, back end, and machine learning engineers will be involved in both projects.
Task distribution and specific responsibilities will be finalized in the next planning session.
